Coordinates of a track.

Source: R/track_methods.R
coords.Rd

Coordinates of a track.

coords(x, ...)

Arguments

x

[track_xy, track_xyt]
A track created with make_track.

...

Further arguments, none implemented.

Value

[tibble]


The coordinates.

Examples

data(deer)
coords(deer)
#> # A tibble: 826 × 2
#>          x_       y_
#>  *    <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 4314068. 3445807.
#>  2 4314053. 3445768.
#>  3 4314105. 3445859.
#>  4 4314044. 3445785.
#>  5 4313015. 3445858.
#>  6 4312860. 3445857.
#>  7 4312854. 3445856.
#>  8 4312858. 3445858.
#>  9 4312745. 3445862.
#> 10 4312651. 3446024.
#> # ℹ 816 more rows
